title: Fishing spot (aerial fishing)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Rod Fishing spots can be found on the island in Lake Molch. These spots are used to catch Bluegill, Common tench, Mottled eel, Greater siren and a Golden tench.

Advanced data
NPC ID8523

Rod Fishing spots can be found on the island in Lake Molch. These spots are used to catch Bluegill, Common tench, Mottled eel, Greater siren and a Golden tench.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Members Spawns Map
Lake Molch20Maplink

Fish[edit | edit source]

Fishing spot (aerial fishing)
Level required 43 35
Fishing XPVaries
Hunter XPVaries
BaitKing worm or Fish chunks
Required toolCormorant's glove
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bluegill1Varies761
Common tench1Varies4261
Mottled eel1Varies651
Greater siren1Varies1011
Golden tench11/20,000Not sold60
Clue bottle1RareNot soldN/A

The formula for what type of fish is caught is as follows.

Pick a random number 0 to (X-1) inclusive, where X = F i s h i n g   l e v e l × 2 + H u n t e r   l e v e l 3 {\displaystyle X={\frac {Fishing\ level\times 2+Hunter\ level}{3}}}

  • If the number is 82+, the player will receive a greater siren if the player meets the level requirements.
  • If it's 67+, the player will receive a mottled eel if the player meets the level requirements.
  • If it's 52+, the player will receive a common tench if the player meets the level requirements.
  • Any other number and the player will receive a bluegill.[1]
  • However it should be remembered that just because you have a required level, it does not mean you will only catch that kind of fish. Just meeting the requirements to catch a fish may not give you a high enough roll to actually catch the given fish, and small values above the requirements give a very small chance. You can use the Aerial fishing calculator to estimate the catch rate at a given Hunter and Fishing level.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 13 June 2019. (Archived from the original on 13 June 2019.) Mod Ash: "Define X = (((Fishing level x 2) + Hunter level) / 3). Pick a random number 0 to (X-1) inclusive. If it's 82+ it'll give a siren if you have the stats. If it's 67+ it'll give an eel if you have the stats. If it's 52+ it'll give a tench if you have the stats. Else bluegill."
